name: Narcissus
overview: Narcissus is 2D arcade side-scrolling platform run' n 'gun game, similar to Contra. The player controls long-haired, commando-like guy with a gun, who landed on a strange planet. He goes right forward, and fights against many strange creatures and robots. He has a gun with unlimited ammo (but he can only shoot straightforward). Standard bosses wait at the end of levels. The game has many "leap of faith" - often hero must jump down without being able to look down. The game hasn't any recovery time - several enemies in a row can almost instantly kill the player. Hero collects special blue balls for points.
